advanced/1 Connection Status/index.title: Connection Status
advanced/1 Connection Status/index.description: CometChat SDK provides you with a mechanism to get real-time status of the connection to CometChat web-socket servers. This can be achieved by registering for the events using the CometChatConnectionDelegate class.

advanced/4 Marking delivered from Push N.id: advanced/4 Marking delivered from Push Notification/index
advanced/4 Marking delivered from Push N.title: Marking delivered from Push Notification
advanced/4 Marking delivered from Push N.description: Implementing the capability to mark a message as "delivered" through a push notification payload can prove to be a pivotal feature. This functionality serves as an accurate representation, confirming to the sender that their message has indeed reached its intended recipient, thereby enhancing the overall user experience.

advanced/5 Publishing on App Store/index.title: Publishing App on App Store
advanced/5 Publishing on App Store/index.description: This guide helps you to push and publish your App on iTunes.

advanced/index.title: Advanced
advanced/index.description: This section helps you know about the Connection Delegates and provide you a guide on how to publish your app with CometChat SDK.

authentication/login-listeners/index.title: Login Listeners
authentication/login-listeners/index.description: CometChat SDK provides you with a mechanism to get real-time status whenever a user logs into CometChat or logs out from CometChat.

calling/Default Calling/index.title: Default Calling
calling/Default Calling/index.description: This section will provide information on how a complete calling workflow can be set up using CometChat. We've built the complete workflow to help your users make calls, receive calls as well as accept/reject calls.

calling/index.title: Calling
calling/index.description: Calling is a core feature of CometChat. CometChat allows two mechanisms for calling

calling/Integration/index.title: Integration
calling/Integration/index.description: The CometChatCalls is developed to keep developers in mind and aims to reduce development efforts significantly. Let's start to integrate Calls Kit into your project.

calling/Recording/index.title: Recording
calling/Recording/index.description: This section will guide you to implement call recording feature for the voice and video calls.

calling/Video view customisation/index.title: Video View Customisation
calling/Video view customisation/index.description: This section will guide you to customise the main video container.

groups/10 Change Member Scope/index.title: Change Member Scope
groups/10 Change Member Scope/index.description: Change Scope of a Group Member

groups/11 Transfer Group Ownership/index.title: Transfer Group Ownership
groups/11 Transfer Group Ownership/index.description: In other words, as a logged-in user, how do I transfer the ownership of any group if I am the owner of the group?

groups/6 Delete a Group/index.title: Delete a Group
groups/6 Delete a Group/index.description: To delete a group you need to use the deleteGroup() method. The user must be an Admin of the group they are trying to delete.

groups/7 Add Members To a Group/index.id: groups/7 Add Members To a Group/index
groups/7 Add Members To a Group/index.title: Add Members To A Group
groups/7 Add Members To a Group/index.description: You can add members to the group using the addMembersToGroup() method. This method takes the below parameters:

groups/8 Retrieve Group Members/index.title: Retrieve Group Members
groups/8 Retrieve Group Members/index.description: In order to fetch the list of groups members for a group, you can use the GroupMembersRequest class. To use this class i.e to create an object of the GroupMembersRequest class, you need to use the GroupMembersRequestBuilder class. The GroupMembersRequestBuilder class allows you to set the parameters based on which the groups are to be fetched.

groups/9 Ban_Kick Members from a Group/i.id: groups/9 Ban_Kick Members from a Group/index
groups/9 Ban_Kick Members from a Group/i.title: Kick Member from a Group
groups/9 Ban_Kick Members from a Group/i.description: There are certain actions that can be performed on the group members:

groups/index.title: Groups
groups/index.description: Groups help your users to converse together in a single space. You can have three types of groups- private, public and password protected.

messaging/1 Sending Messages/index.title: Send a Message
messaging/1 Sending Messages/index.description: Using CometChat, you can send three types of messages:

messaging/2 Receiving Messages/index.title: Receive a Message
messaging/2 Receiving Messages/index.description: Receiving messages with CometChat has two parts:

messaging/3 Additional Message Filtering.title: Additional Message Filtering
messaging/3 Additional Message Filtering.description: The MessagesRequest class as you must be familiar with helps you to fetch messages based on the various parameters provided to it. This document will help you understand better the various options that are available using the MessagesRequest class.

messaging/4 Retrieve Conversations/index.title: Retrieve Conversations
messaging/4 Retrieve Conversations/index.description: CometChat Allows you to fetch the list of conversations the logged-in user is a part of. This list of conversations consists of both user and group conversations.

messaging/5 Threaded Messages/index.title: Threaded Messages
messaging/5 Threaded Messages/index.description: Messages that are started from a particular message are called Threaded messages or simply threads.

messaging/6 Editing Messages/index.title: Edit a Message
messaging/6 Editing Messages/index.description: While editing a message is straightforward, receiving events for edited messages with CometChat has two parts:

messaging/7 Delete a Message/index.title: Delete a Message
messaging/7 Delete a Message/index.description: While deleting a Message is straightforward, receiving events for deleted messages with CometChat has two parts:

messaging/8 Delete a Conversation/index.title: Delete a Conversation
messaging/8 Delete a Conversation/index.description: In case you want to delete a conversation, you can use the deleteConversation() method.

messaging/index.title: Messaging
messaging/index.description: Messaging is one of the core features of CometChat. We've thoughtfully created methods to help you send, receive and fetch message history.

messaging/Mentions/index.title: Mentions
messaging/Mentions/index.description: Mentions are a powerful tool for enhancing communication in messaging platforms. They streamline interaction by allowing users to easily engage and collaborate with particular individuals, especially in group conversations.

messaging/Reactions/index.title: Reactions
messaging/Reactions/index.description: Enhance user engagement in your chat application with message reactions. Users can express their emotions using reactions to messages. This feature allows users to add or remove reactions, and to fetch all reactions on a message. You can also listen to reaction events in real-time. Let's see how to work with reactions in CometChat's iOS SDK.

messaging/Transient Messages/index.title: Transient Messages
messaging/Transient Messages/index.description: Transient messages are messages that are sent in real-time only and are not saved or tracked anywhere. The receiver of the message will only receive the message if he is online and these messages cannot be retrieved later.

overview/index.title: Overview
overview/index.description: This guide demonstrates how to add chat to an iOS application using CometChat. Before you begin, we strongly recommend you read the Key Concepts guide.

overview/message-structure-and-hierarchy.title: Message Structure and Hierarchy
overview/message-structure-and-hierarchy.description: The below diagram helps you better understand the various message categories and types that a CometChat message can belong to.

resources/2 Increment App Icon Badge Cou.id: resources/2 Increment App Icon Badge Count/index
resources/2 Increment App Icon Badge Cou.title: Increment App Icon Badge Count
resources/2 Increment App Icon Badge Cou.description: This guide helps you to set up an incremented badge for the app icon using Notification Service Extension.

resources/4 Remove Delivered Notificatio.title: Remove Delivered Notifications
resources/4 Remove Delivered Notificatio.description: This guide helps you to set up with which you can remove certainly delivered notifications using Notification Service Extension.

resources/5 Launch call screen on tap of.id: resources/5 Launch call screen on tap of push notification/index
resources/5 Launch call screen on tap of.title: Launch Call Screen on Tap of Push Notification
resources/5 Launch call screen on tap of.description: This guide helps you to launch an incoming call screen from the UI Kit library on receiving an incoming call notification.

resources/6 Launch chat window on tap of.id: resources/6 Launch chat window on tap of push notification/index
resources/6 Launch chat window on tap of.title: Launch Chat Window on Tap of Push Notification
resources/6 Launch chat window on tap of.description: This guide helps you to launch a chat window from the UI Kit library on receiving a new message notification.

resources/7 Prepare your app for backgro.id: resources/7 Prepare your app for background updates/index
resources/7 Prepare your app for backgro.title: Prepare your app for background updates
resources/7 Prepare your app for backgro.description: In iOS, when the user enters in the background state, real time connection breaks with the server. So, if the user comes inside the chat window or in the conversation list then it won't update the new messages received from the real time server until it's being fetched from the API.

resources/8 Upgrading from v3/index.title: Upgrading from v3
resources/8 Upgrading from v3/index.description: Upgrading from v3 to v4 is fairly simple. Below are the major changes that are released as a part of CometChat v4. We have renamed our SDK from CometChatPro to CometChatSDK and CometChatCalls to CometChatCallsSDK for Chat and Calls SDK receptively. Note only import name is changed all class name inside the SDKs are same as it is before. There will only be few changes required for v4 migration. Let's start!

resources/9 Upgrading from v2/index.title: Upgrading from v2
resources/9 Upgrading from v2/index.description: Upgrading from v2.x to v3 is fairly simple. Below are the major changes that are released as a part of CometChat v3:

resources/index.title: Resources
resources/index.description: We have a number of resources that will help you while integrating CometChat in your app.

user-presence/index.title: User Presence
user-presence/index.description: User Presence helps us understand if a user is available to chat or not.

users/2 User Management/index.title: User Management
users/2 User Management/index.description: When a user logs into your app, you need to programmatically login the user into CometChat. But before you log in the user to CometChat, you need to create the user.

users/index.title: Users
users/index.description: The primary aim for our users' functionality is to allow you to quickly retrieve and add users to CometChat.
